name: Sensei
overview:
Sensei, an innovator and leader in mobile health care technologies, was created to develop innovative solutions for health and wellness through the integration of information systems and wireless technology. Founded by a cardiologist with 20 years of clinical experience and executive experience in disease management and telemedicine, the company is driven by a multidisciplinary executive team with extensive experience in the fields of wireless technology, IT (biotech & finance), medicine, nutrition, and software development.
Wireless has created a new paradigm in consumer engagement, with personalized anytime anywhere two way interactions. The Sensei platform was developed to support and enhance this new paradigm providing interactive, personalized guidance and information to large and diverse populations. Senseiâ€™s new tools of engagement have positioned us as a leader in the wireless health space. Health plans, population management companies, and employers seek tools and programs on mobile platforms to engage and empower consumers. Senseiâ€™s applications demonstrate the flexibility, capability and robustness of our approach. Our strategic plan is to expand on the catalogue of branded programs and help other organizationâ€™s expansion into the mobile marketplace through partnerships and licensing.
